name: Special Spatial Task Force
description:
📕 INSTRUCTIONS 📕
  1. Avoid obstacles and destroy enemies to survive as long as possible.
  2. Grab a power-up to rescue an ally.
  3. You control all allies at once!
  4. If an ally is destroyed you will continue progressing as long as you have 1 ship.
  5. Fight through 5 stages! If that's too easy for you, you can activate HARD MODE on the pause menu!
🎮 CONTROL 🎮
  • The ships fire automatically
  • Use the directional keys to move all ships at once
  • If a ship leaves the screen it warps to the other side
📜 CREDITS 📜
  • CODE : BoneVolt
  • GFX : BoneVolt
  • MUSIC : Jamaass
